pkgmetadata.longdescription: Methods for Fitting Network Time Series Models // Simulation of, and fitting models for, Generalised Network Autoregressive (GNAR) time series models which take account of network structure, potentially with exogenous variables. Such models are described in Knight et al. (2020) doi:10.18637/jss.v096.i05 and Nason and Wei (2021) doi:10.1111/rssa.12875.
